name: Veiled: Crippled Princess And Blind Knight
name_original: Veiled: Crippled Princess And Blind Knight
description:
It is a parody of Korean traditional fairy tale "Crippled and blind". As the couple in the fairy tale cooperate with each other to tackle adversity, a princess with a broken leg and an injured knight join together to escape the castle of the witch. You can move the tiles using WASD, and interact with objects by pressing the F key. An unseen knight can not see a small threat in front of him, You must listen to and act on the information the princess tells you. Stage 1, which is currently configured, passes through three trapping sections, and the switch is pressed to open the door, acquire the key, open the locked door, and win.

 

※ Actually, there are 1 stage - Dungeon / 2 Stage - Castle of Witch / 3 Stage - It is a configuration to get out of the forest. However, the level design is complete, and the time for the placement of the graphic resource and the level is cut short, and only one stage is submitted as the prototype

 

※ There are multi-ending elements in the game, 1. Princess leaving alone / 2. Knight leaving alone / 3. Dead togeher / 4. go out together There are four root endings. But... it is not currently implemented.”
